snippet: David Villa and Kwadwo Poku each had a goal and an assist to lead City F.C. past the Impact at Yankee Stadium on Saturday.
abstract: New York City F C defeats Montreal Impact, 3-1, in MLS action.
lead_paragraph: David Villa and Kwadwo Poku each had a goal and an assist to lead City F.C. past the Impact at Yankee Stadium on Saturday.

headline.main: New York City F.C. Tops Montreal for Second Straight Win
